title: Textile, 1920–29
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave and glazed
description: Half-drop repeat of a swagged pillar topped with three feather plumes. A garland of flowers wrapped around the top of the draped pillar forming a base for the plumes. The trailing ends of the garland frame the motif and by shading create a vertical curve. Predominantly rose and purple and ivory on a gray background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–29.Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave and glazed. 1973-30-1.
